*[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] *[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]] }} == Description == The '''Token Collector''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the drop rate of [[Dungeon Tokens]] by 50% for 30 seconds. == Details == +50% Bonus to [[Dungeon Tokens]] gained. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Pewter City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} ===Dungeon Loot=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
